abstract: Russian organization Set, youth political movement with close ties to Kremlin, plans to distribute book Words That Change the World as holiday gift to specially chosen government officials; book offers quotes from speeches and interviews by Pres Vladimir V Putin and is intended as handy resource for politicians in discussions with young Russians about country's leadership and future.
lead_paragraph: A book of quotes, compiled by a youth political movement and drawn from the past 12 years of the president’s most important speeches and interviews, is being presented as a gift from the Kremlin.

headline.main: Vladimir Putin’s Quotes: A Collection for the Discerning Russian Official
headline.print_headline: The Words of Putin, as a Gift

snippet: A book of quotes, compiled by a youth political movement and drawn from the past 12 years of the president’s most important speeches and interviews, is being presented as a gift from the Kremlin.
